chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
S: Set
A: S -> Prop
Mult: S -> S -> S
Add: S -> S -> S
I: S
O: S
Opp: S -> S
v: S -> nat

Goal:
is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult (Opp x) y = Opp (Mult x y)

Premises:
is_ring = commutativity S Add /\ is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult : Prop
opp_unicity : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall x y : S, is_opposite S G Add O x y -> y = Opp x
regular_l : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall y z : S, G y -> G z -> forall x : S, G x -> Add x y = Add x z -> y = z
mult_opp_r : is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult x (Opp y) = Opp (Mult x y)
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> VectorDef.t ?C n where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?C : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v0) ?n (VectorDef.tl v0) where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n) -> Fin.t (p + ?m) -> Fin.t (p + ?n) where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n) (p1 p2 p3 : Fin.t n), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v0 w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?C : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S ->...-> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (Datatypes.S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S ->...-> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n), P n (VectorDef.cons ?A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n)), P n v where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
mult_O : is_ring -> forall x : S, A x -> Mult x O = O /\ Mult O x = O
is_opposite : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> S -> S -> Prop
distributivity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
neutral : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> Prop
is_group : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> (S -> S) -> Prop
opposite : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> (S -> S) -> Prop
commutativity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
associativity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_stepl : forall x y z : nat, x = y -> x = z -> z = y
intern : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
Znat.neq = fun x y : nat => x <> y : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Znat.neq (_ _)%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.max_monotone : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
PeanoNat.Nat.max_mono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimonotone : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
PeanoNat.Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
Nat.div = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | Datatypes.S y' => fst (Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.div (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments Datatypes.S _%nat_scope
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
